item.title: Makefile and Beamer presentations
item.description: I have been wondering about Makefiles for some time now, and recently I finally got around learning about them so that I could use make to regenerate all the different versions of a manuscript I’m working on. And I thought I would take the opportunity to explain how they can be useful for Beamer presentations.
